com.groupb.lathe.math

Class Matrix4f

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.groupb.lathe.math.Matrix4f

  • public class Matrix4f
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles matrix math for us. We do have joml as a dependency, but this takes out some overhead. All methods assume Column Major ordering because OpenGL expects this format.
    Author:
    ashtonwalden

        far - far clipping
        Returns:

      • toFloatBuffer

        public java.nio.FloatBuffer toFloatBuffer()
        Easily converts the matrix to a float buffer. OpenGL only recognizes float buffers.
        Returns:
        The matrix as a float buffer
